description.plain:
Often regarded as one of the best rappers of all time, Atlanta, Georgia’s André Lauren Benjamin, better known by his stage name, André 3000, is a rapper, singer-songwriter, record producer, multi-instrumentalist, and actor, best known for his work as one-half of the hip-hop duo OutKast alongside his partner in rhyme, Big Boi.

André and Big Boi came together during their high school years and released their first single, “Player’s Ball,” in 1993 before releasing their debut album Southernplayalisticadillacmuzik in 1994. The duo has released some of the most critically acclaimed albums in hip-hop history, culminating in them winning the Grammy Award for Album of the Year for their 2003 double album Speakerboxxx/The Love Below, in part due to his genre-bending single “Hey Ya!” OutKast went on hiatus and André made a number of show-stealing guest appearances over the years as fans continue to anticipate another full-length project from him.

body.plain:
Often regarded as one of the best rappers of all time, Atlanta, Georgia’s André Lauren Benjamin, better known by his stage name, André 3000, is a rapper, singer-songwriter, record producer, multi-instrumentalist, and actor, best known for his work as one-half of the hip-hop duo OutKast alongside his partner in rhyme, Big Boi.

André and Big Boi came together during their high school years and released their first single, “Player’s Ball,” in 1993 before releasing their debut album Southernplayalisticadillacmuzik in 1994. The duo has released some of the most critically acclaimed albums in hip-hop history, culminating in them winning the Grammy Award for Album of the Year for their 2003 double album Speakerboxxx/The Love Below, in part due to his genre-bending single “Hey Ya!” OutKast went on hiatus and André made a number of show-stealing guest appearances over the years as fans continue to anticipate another full-length project from him.

songs.full_title: Me&My (To Bury Your Parents) by André 3000
songs.title: Me&My (To Bury Your Parents)

description.plain:
André 3000 makes a surprise return to music with
two tracks released on Mother’s Day, 2018 in honor of his mother and father. Dedicated to his youth and time he spent with his parents, the track was released alongside “Look Ma No Hands”, featuring piano from British singer-songwriter James Blake.
Along with the lyrics and a caption prefacing the song, Andre also posted screenshots of conversations with his mother on Instagram. Both tracks were released on Andre’s official soundcloud page.

songs.embed_content: Read “Me&My (To Bury Your Parents)” by André 3000 on Genius

album.full_title: Look Ma No Hands by André 3000
album.name: Look Ma No Hands

body.plain:
André 3000 makes a surprise return to music with
two tracks released on Mother’s Day, 2018 in honor of his mother and father. Dedicated to his youth and time he spent with his parents, the track was released alongside “Look Ma No Hands”, featuring piano from British singer-songwriter James Blake.
Along with the lyrics and a caption prefacing the song, Andre also posted screenshots of conversations with his mother on Instagram. Both tracks were released on Andre’s official soundcloud page.

songs.lyrics:
Me&My (To Bury Your Parents) Lyrics[Verse 1]
Me and my mother, driving to the grocery store
Me riding shotgun with my window rolled down
She smoked cigarettes and gets what she gets by
Hustling harder, rollers and a nightgown

[Verse 2]
Me and my father, driving to the football game
Me riding shotgun, my window rolled down
He sipped Cognac and kept us all laughing
I was much happier when he was around
[Bridge]
When he was around
When he was around
Around

[Instrumental Interlude]

[Outro]
Around
Around
Around
Me and my mother
Me and my father
Me and my—
Me and my—
Me and—
Me and—
MeYou might also like13Embed

songs.full_title: Look Ma No Hands by André 3000
songs.title: Look Ma No Hands

description.plain: “Look Ma No Hands” is one of the two tracks Andre 3000 released for Mother’s Day, 2018. Released through his official SoundCloud, the track is instrumental and soulful, featuring Andre on the bass clarinet and British singer-songwriter James Blake on the piano. Alongside his other, simultaneously released track “Me&My” (To Bury Your Parents)", Andre has made a heartwarming return to music dedicated to his mother and father.

Alongside his other, simultaneously released track “Me&My” (To Bury Your Parents)", Andre has made a heartwarming return to music dedicated to his mother and father.

songs.full_title: Outkast Reunion Tour Jumpsuit Slogans by André 3000
songs.title: Outkast Reunion Tour Jumpsuit Slogans

description.plain:
Outkast went on a Reunion tour in 2014, hitting up 40 festivals up in the process.

Along the way Andre 3000, being the style icon he is, wore a white wig and white shades to match his black jumpsuit – often with an oversized “SOLD OUT” tag.

Each jumpsuit was unique, worded in white lettering and ranging from bizarre to political to hilarious. Check out each slogan here!

songs.full_title: We Want Your Soul by André 3000
songs.title: We Want Your Soul

description.plain: The song, “We Want Your Soul”, or, “All We Want Is Your Soul”, is one of the many songs from Andre 3000’s cartoon series, ‘Class of 3000’, which aired from 2006 to 2008, on Cartoon Network. This song has a deep meaning that most children at the time of watching this episode of this show didn’t understand. It spread the truth about the music industry, and portrays very well that you have to sell your soul to make music, in the music video.

songs.lyrics:
Hey Ya! - Single Version Lyrics[Intro: André 3000]
1, 2, 3, uh!

[Verse 1: André 3000]
My baby don't mess around
Because she loves me so, and this I know for sure (Uh)
But does she really wanna
But can't stand to see me walk out the door? (Ah)
Don't try to fight the feeling
'Cause the thought alone is killing me right now (Uh)
Thank God for Mom and Dad
For sticking to together 'cause we don't know how (C'mon)
[Chorus: André 3000]
Hey ya! Hey ya!
Hey ya! Hey ya!
Hey ya! Hey ya!
Hey ya! Hey ya!

[Verse 2: André 3000]
You think you've got it, oh, you think you've got it
But “got it” just don't get it 'til there's nothing at all
We get together, oh, we get together
But separate's always better when there's feelings involved
If what they say is “Nothing is forever”
Then what makes, then what makes, then what makes
Then what makes, what makes, what makes love the exception?
So why oh, why oh, why oh, why oh, why oh
Are we so in denial when we know we're not happy here?
Y'all don't want to hear me, you just want to dance

[Chorus: André 3000]
Hey ya! (Uh-oh) Hey ya! (Uh-oh)
Don't want to meet your daddy
Hey ya! (Uh-oh)
Just want you in my Caddy (Uh-oh)
Hey ya! (Uh-oh)

Hey ya! Uh-oh
Just want to make you cumma (Uh-oh)
Hey ya! Uh-oh
I'm, I'm, I'm, I'm just being honest (Uh-oh)
Hey ya!
I'm just being honest
You might also like[Bridge 1: André 3000]
Hey, alright now, alright now, fellas (Yeah?)
Now, what's cooler than being cool? (Ice Cold!)
I can't hear ya
I say what's, what's cooler than being cool? (Ice Cold!)
Alright, alright, alright, alright, alright, alright, alright, alright
Alright, alright, alright, alright, alright, alright
Okay now, ladies (Yeah?)
Now, we gon' break this thing down in just a few seconds
Now don't have me break this thing down for nothing
Now I want to see y'all on your baddest behavior
Lend me some sugar, I am your neighbor
Ah, here we go!

[Refrain: André 3000]
Shake it, sh-shake it, shake it, sh-shake it (Uh-oh)
Shake it, sh-shake it, Shake it, shake it, sh-shake it (Uh-oh)
Shake it like a Polaroid picture, hey ya!

Shake it, shake it (okay), shake it, sugar
Shake it like a Polaroid picture

[Bridge 2: André 3000]
Now all the Beyoncés and Lucy Lius
And baby dolls, get on the floor
You know what to do, oh, you know what to do
You know what to do
[Chorus: André 3000]
Hey ya! (Uh-oh) Hey ya! (Uh-oh)
Hey ya! (Uh-oh) Hey ya! (Uh-oh, hey ya!)

songs.lyrics:
Fight The Blob LyricsAlright, Westley Funkaneers, today we go to war
I want you to man your instruments
Hello? Well, lady your instruments, whatever
You know what I'm talking about

Because we have a big, big problem on our hands
And I say before we let this blob take over our city
We funk him outta town
Ya'll ready?

Blob, you goin' down
Hey, hey, hey, blob, get out of town
The Westley mob gon' make you frown
Hey, hey, hey, blob, you goin' down
Nuclear waste, sloppy joe
Where it goes no one knows
Maybe underground where it's found
But it can't play here no more, sing, come on

Nuclear waste, sloppy joe
Where it goes no one knows
Maybe underground where it's found
But it can't play here no more

Hey, hey, hey, blob, you goin' down
Hey, hey, hey, blob, get out of town
The Westley mob gon' make you frown
Hey, hey, hey, blob, you goin' down

Well done soldiers, the battle is won
But the war continues
Thanks to every last one of you courageous Funkaneers
Atlanta can sleep tight tonight

Because you faced your problems head on
You didn't run away from 'em
And that's how true players do it
They get straight to it, at ease soldiersYou might also likeEmbed
